iwork
Interface IWRoomConfigValues

public interface IWRoomConfigValues

This is a helper interface for applications that use the iwork API in the Interactive Room (iRoom) at Stanford. It contains members with the default system settings for the iRoom.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_HEAP_MACHINE
          Deprecated. Used by Event Heap v1 clients to determine to which machine they should connect
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_HEAP_NAME
          Deprecated. Used by Event Heap v1 clients to determine which tuplespace on the TSpaces server to use as the Event Heap.
static int DEFAULT_HEAP_PORT
          Deprecated. Used by Event Heap v1 clients to determine on which port the TSpaces server was running (with -1 indicating the default port for TSpaces).
static java.lang.String IROOM_DEFAULT_MACHINE
          The default machine that the Event Heap server runs on.
static int IROOM_DEFAULT_PORT
          The default port of the Event Heap server on the machine the server runs on.
 

Field Detail

IROOM_DEFAULT_MACHINE

public static final java.lang.String IROOM_DEFAULT_MACHINE
The default machine that the Event Heap server runs on. Can be passed to the EventHeap class constructor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

IROOM_DEFAULT_PORT

public static final int IROOM_DEFAULT_PORT
The default port of the Event Heap server on the machine the server runs on. Can be passed to the EventHeap class constructor.
